sentences.en: " Oh, are you going to the lumber yard? "
sentences.cn: " 唔, 你要到木料场去?
一辆蓝色公共汽车慢吞吞地驶过。

sentences.en: Although the wood has good technical properties, the quality of lumber produced is not high.
sentences.cn: 虽然此木材具有好的加工性能, 但所生产的板材质量不高.

sentences.en: Can you hack it as a lumber jack?
sentences.cn: 你当伐木工人可以熬得住 吗 ?

sentences.en: Forested areas have been expanding every year, with the increase in standing timber greater than that of felled lumber.
sentences.cn: 森林面积每年都在增加,林木生长量大于消耗量.

sentences.en: He leads the nation in lumber production.
He refused to lumber himself with a family.
In the movement of logs by water the lumber industry was greatly helped by alligators.
sentences.cn: 木材工业过去在水上运输木料时所十分倚重的就是鳄鱼.

sentences.en: It was made of soft lumber, spruce by the look of it.
sentences.cn: 其制作材料是软木，看起来像是云杉。

sentences.en: Lumber production and total production occurred in predictable ratios to one another.
sentences.cn: 因为木材生产量与总产量之间出现了可预测的比例关系.

sentences.en: Piles of lumber were stacked along the road.
sentences.cn: 大量的木材堆放在路边.

sentences.en: The five vertebrae next to the lumber vertebrae are fused together to form the sacrum.
sentences.cn: 在腰椎下是五个椎骨融合在一起形成的骶骨.

sentences.en: The truck was sent to carry lumber.
This envelope bore the return stamp of a prominent Boston lumber - company.
sentences.cn: 信封上贴着一家著名的波士顿木材公司的往返邮票.

sentences.en: This lumber is seasoned for several years.
sentences.cn: 这种木柴已经风干好几年了.

sentences.en: With these difficulties Hugh didn't get into town to sell the lumber for days on end.
sentences.cn: 因为这些困难,休一连数日未能进城去推销木材.

words.tran_cn: 伐木工人；木材商的佣工；短茄克衫
伐树；使陷入麻烦；笨重地移动（lumber的ing形式）
[木]木材；废物，无用的杂物；隆隆声
伐木；喧闹地向前走；笨重地行动，缓慢地移动

trans.tran_cn: 木材，废旧家具，不用的大件物品
trans.tran_en: pieces of wood used for building, that have been cut to specific lengths and widths
to move in a slow awkward way
